languages.text: К немалому удивлению ваших офицеров, "Оседлавший тьму" вновь предстает перед вами. Точнее, его хорошо сконструированная копия. Капитан Катриона интересуется, есть ли у вас последнее слово.

traits.locale_text: К немалому удивлению ваших офицеров, "Оседлавший тьму" вновь предстает перед вами. Точнее, его хорошо сконструированная копия. Капитан Катриона интересуется, есть ли у вас последнее слово.

languages.text: Much to the surprise of your officers, the Saddler of Darkness appears before you again. Or, more accurately, its faithfully constructed replica. Captain Katriona enquires if you have any last words.
languages.original_text: К немалому удивлению ваших офицеров, "Оседлавший тьму" вновь предстает перед вами. Точнее, его хорошо сконструированная копия. Капитан Катриона интересуется, есть ли у вас последнее слово.

traits.locale_text: Much to the surprise of your officers, the Saddler of Darkness appears before you again. Or, more exactly, its faithfully constructed replica. Captain Katriona inquires if you have any last words.
Much to the surprise of your officers, the Saddler of Darkness appears before you again. Or, more exactly, its faithfully constructed replica. Captain Katriona inquires if you have any last words.
Much to the surprise of your officers, the Saddler of Darkness appears before you again. Or, more accurately, its faithfully constructed replica. Captain Katriona inquires if you have any last words.

Much to the surprise of your officers, the Saddler of Darkness appears before you again. Or, more accurately, its faithfully constructed replica. Captain Katriona enquires if you have any last words.
Much to the surprise of your officers, the Saddler of Darkness appears before you again. Or, more accurately, its faithfully constructed replica. Captain Katriona enquires if you have any last words.

languages.text: 黑暗之鞍号再次出现在你的面前，这令你的军官们无比惊讶。准确地说，那艘船其实是黑暗之鞍号惟妙惟肖的仿制品。卡托莉娜舰长问你有没有什么遗言要交代。
languages.original_text: Much to the surprise of your officers, the Saddler of Darkness appears before you again. Or, more accurately, its faithfully constructed replica. Captain Katriona enquires if you have any last words.

traits.locale_text: 黑暗之鞍号再次出现在你的面前，这令你的军官们无比惊讶。准确地说，那艘船其实是黑暗之鞍号惟妙惟肖的仿制品。卡托莉娜舰长问你有没有什么遗言要交代。

languages.text: Para sorpresa de tus oficiales, el Jinete de la Oscuridad vuelve a aparecer ante ti. Bueno, realmente es una copia fielmente reproducida. La capitana Katriona te pregunta si tienes últimas palabras.
languages.original_text: Much to the surprise of your officers, the Saddler of Darkness appears before you again. Or, more accurately, its faithfully constructed replica. Captain Katriona enquires if you have any last words.

traits.locale_text: Para sorpresa de tus oficiales, el Jinete de la Oscuridad vuelve a aparecer ante ti. Bueno, realmente es una copia fielmente reproducida. La capitana Katriona te pregunta si tienes últimas palabras.

languages.text: 士官たちが驚いたことに、暗黒のサドラー号は再び目の前に姿を現した。正確には、船は忠実に再現されたレプリカだ。カトリオーナ船長は最後に言い残すことはないかと尋ねる。
languages.original_text: Much to the surprise of your officers, the Saddler of Darkness appears before you again. Or, more accurately, its faithfully constructed replica. Captain Katriona enquires if you have any last words.

traits.locale_text: 士官たちが驚いたことに、暗黒のサドラー号は再び目の前に姿を現した。正確には、船は忠実に再現されたレプリカだ。カトリオーナ船長は最後に言い残すことはないかと尋ねる。

languages.text: Sehr zur Überraschung deiner Offiziere taucht die Saddler of Darkness wieder vor euch auf. Oder besser gesagt ein originalgetreuer Nachbau. Captain Katriona erkundigt sich, ob du irgendwelche letzten Worte hast.
languages.original_text: Much to the surprise of your officers, the Saddler of Darkness appears before you again. Or, more accurately, its faithfully constructed replica. Captain Katriona enquires if you have any last words.

traits.locale_text: Sehr zur Überraschung deiner Offiziere taucht die Saddler of Darkness wieder vor euch auf. Oder besser gesagt ein originalgetreuer Nachbau. Captain Katriona erkundigt sich, ob du irgendwelche letzten Worte hast.

languages.text: Pour la plus grande surprise de vos officiers, le Bourrelier des ténèbres apparaît à nouveau devant vous. Ou, plus précisément, sa réplique quasi parfaite. La capitaine Katriona vous demande quels seront vos derniers mots.
languages.original_text: Much to the surprise of your officers, the Saddler of Darkness appears before you again. Or, more accurately, its faithfully constructed replica. Captain Katriona enquires if you have any last words.

traits.locale_text: Pour la plus grande surprise de vos officiers, le Bourrelier des ténèbres apparaît à nouveau devant vous. Ou, plus précisément, sa réplique quasi parfaite. La capitaine Katriona vous demande quels seront vos derniers mots.
